name: font
description: Before you decide to use this library, be aware that [OpenType.js](https://nodebox.github.io/opentype.js) has become better at doing what you were probably thinking of using Font.js for - I still think JavaScript needs a Font object, but at this point rewriting it from scratch so that it's backed by OpenType.js is far more sensible than using Font.js in its current form. So: head on over there and discover an amazing library.
